alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 12:23AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jefferson County through 100 AM CDT... At 1221 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tamaroa, or 11 miles southeast of Nashville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Woodlawn around 1235 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Mount Vernon and Bluford. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 82 and 97. Interstate 64 in Illinois between Mile Markers 72 and 91. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
